attributes.action: worry about what our young people are watching.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the horrific attack on young children by young children I watched 'The Dark Knight' batman film and was astonished that it was only a 12 certificate. 12 too young. 
The Joker was slashing peoples faces with knives saying that he far preferred knives to guns and the threatening behaviour (to slash the womans face) was gross.
I do worry for our young people out and about when other young people are watching this.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
